Segment.name: ID1
Segment.comment: To transmit information about the physical characteristics of items

Field.name: UPCEanConsumerPackageCode
Field.comment: Code (Universal Product Code - U.P.C.) identifying the retail shelf unit; consists of 2 high order digits identifying the system (U.S. Grocery = 00, 06 or 07, U.S. Drug = 03); the next ten digits are manufacturer ID: 5, Item ID: 5

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: FreeFormDescription
Field.comment: Free-form descriptive text

Field.name: Size
Field.comment: Size of supplier units in pack

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Height
Field.comment: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: Width
Field.comment: Shorter measurement of the two horizontal dimensions measured with the object in the upright position

Field.name: ItemDepth
Field.comment: The depth is the thickness of the product; in the dimension coordinate axes represented by X, Y and Z, depth is measured along the Z axis where X is the horizontal axis and Y is the vertical axis

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Weight
Field.comment: Numeric value of weight

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode3
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: CategoryReferenceCode
Field.comment: Code specifying whose coding system is being used for category and subcategory

Field.name: Category
Field.comment: An alphanumeric identifier to represent the category to which the item belongs

Field.name: Subcategory
Field.comment: An alphanumeric identifier to represent the subcategory to which the item belongs

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode4
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Pack
Field.comment: The number of inner containers, or number of eaches if there are no inner containers, per outer container

Field.name: InnerPack
Field.comment: The number of eaches per inner container

Field.name: DateQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: NestingCode
Field.comment: Code indicating orientation of exposure

Field.name: Nesting
Field.comment: The amount of distance that one product fits into (or nests within) another product

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode5
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: PegCode
Field.comment: Code indicating how the vertical or height distance is measured for peg hole items

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode6
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification1
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: XPeg1
Field.comment: Horizontal distance from the edge to the center of the peg hole (measured from the left)

Field.name: YPeg1
Field.comment: The vertical distance from the edge to the center of the peg hole as specified by the peg code

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification2
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: XPeg2
Field.comment: Horizontal distance from the edge to the center of the peg hole (measured from the left)

Field.name: YPeg2
Field.comment: The vertical distance from the edge to the center of the peg hole as specified by the peg code

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification3
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: XPeg3
Field.comment: Horizontal distance from the edge to the center of the peg hole (measured from the left)

Field.name: YPeg3
Field.comment: The vertical distance from the edge to the center of the peg hole as specified by the peg code
